commandDescription: Download and populate your (dx) project with metadata from another org
dxFlagDescription: Indicates if you want the source converted to sfdx format
targetDirFlagDescription: The directory the extraced source should be placed in
excludeManagedFlagDescription: Exclude managed packages (and related items) from output
configFlagDescription: Configuration file to help make pulling metadata more scriptable
quickfilterFlagDescription: CSV list of metadata types to filter
skipCleanupFlagDescription: Do not cleanup temporary files after completion
